alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 11 at 11:02PM EST until January 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Cambria and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From noon Friday to midnight EST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
